00037 /*
00038  * Write an 8 bit number to the file.
00039  */
00040 void FileOutput::WriteInt8(std::ofstream &outstr, int8_t value)
00041 {
00042         outstr.write((char *)&value, sizeof(value));
00043 }
00044 
00045 /*
00046  * Write a 16 bit number to the file.
00047  */
00048 void FileOutput::WriteInt16(std::ofstream &outstr, int16_t value)
00049 {
00050         value = htons(value);
00051         outstr.write((char *)&value, sizeof(value));
00052 }
00053 
00054 /*
00055  * Write a 32 bit number to the file.
00056  */
00057 void FileOutput::WriteInt32(std::ofstream &outstr, int32_t value)
00058 {
00059         value = htonl(value);
00060         outstr.write((char *)&value, sizeof(value));
00061 }

00089 /*
00090  * Write a 32 bit floating point value from a file.
00091  */
00092 void FileOutput::WriteFloat(std::ofstream &outstr, float value)
00093 {
00094         type_punned pun;
00095         pun.v_float=value;
00096         WriteInt32(outstr,pun.v_int32);
00097 }
00098 
00099 /*
00100  * Write a string to the file stream.
00101  */
00102 void FileOutput::WriteString8(std::ofstream &outstr, const std::string &value)
00103 {
00104         int32_t len = (int32_t) value.length();
00105         FileOutput::WriteInt32(outstr, len);
00106         FileOutput::WriteString8(outstr, value.c_str(), len);
00107 }
00108 
00109 /*
00110  * Write a string to the file stream. Pad with nulls.
00111  */
00112 void FileOutput::WriteString8(std::ofstream &outstr, const char *value, int32_t len)
00113 {
00114   // how much padding will we need?
00115   int pad_len;
00116   int str_len;
00117 
00118   if (value==NULL) {
00119     pad_len=len;
00120   }
00121   else {
00122     str_len=strlen(value);
00123     if (len<str_len) {
00124       outstr.write(value,len);
00125       return;
00126     }
00127     outstr.write(value,str_len);
00128     pad_len=len-str_len;
00129   }
00130   // padding
00131   while (pad_len!=0) {
00132     outstr.put(0);
00133     pad_len--;
00134   }
00135 }
00136 
00137 /*
00138  * Write the length (integer) then the string to the file.
00139  */
00140 void FileOutput::WriteString16(std::ofstream &outstr, const std::wstring &value)
00141 {
00142         int32_t len = (int32_t) value.length();
00143         FileOutput::WriteInt32(outstr, len);
00144         FileOutput::WriteString16(outstr, value.c_str(), len);
00145 }
00146 
00147 /*
00148  * Write a string to the file stream.
00149  */
00150 void FileOutput::WriteString16(std::ofstream &outstr, const std::wstring &value, int32_t maxLn)
00151 {
00152     int32_t len = (int32_t) value.length();
00153     if(len <= maxLn)
00154     {
00155                 u_int16_t cvalue;
00156                 const wchar_t *str = value.c_str();
00157                 FileOutput::WriteInt32(outstr, maxLn);
00158                 for (int i=0; i<len; i++)
00159                 {
00160                         cvalue = (u_int16_t) str[i];
00161                         cvalue = htons(cvalue);
00162                         outstr.write((char *)&cvalue, sizeof(u_int16_t));
00163                 }
00164         int32_t bufLn = maxLn - len;
00165         for(int i = 0; i < bufLn; i++)
00166         {
00167             WriteString16(outstr, L"\0", 1);
00168         }
00169     }
00170 }
00171 
00172 /*
00173  * Write a string to the file.
00174  */
00175 void FileOutput::WriteString16(std::ofstream &outstr, const wchar_t *value, int32_t len)
00176 {
00177         u_int16_t cvalue;
00178         for (int i=0; i<len; i++)
00179         {
00180                 cvalue = (u_int16_t) value[i];
00181                 cvalue = htons(cvalue);
00182                 outstr.write((char *)&cvalue, sizeof(u_int16_t));
00183         }
00184 }
00185 
00186 /*
00187  * Write a string to the file stream.
00188  */
00189 void FileOutput::WriteString8(std::ofstream &outstr, const std::string &value, int32_t maxLn)
00190 {
00191     int32_t len = (int32_t) value.length();
00192     if(len <= maxLn)
00193     {
00194             WriteString8(outstr, value);
00195         int32_t bufLn = maxLn - len;
00196         for(int i = 0; i < bufLn; i++)
00197         {
00198             WriteString8(outstr, "\0", 1);
00199         }
00200     }
00201 }

00203 /*
00204  * Write a blob to the file stream.
00205  */
00206 void FileOutput::WriteBlob(std::ofstream &outstr, const void* value, int32_t size)
00207 {
00208         FileOutput::WriteInt32(outstr, size);
00209         outstr.write((const char*)value, size);
00210 }
00211 
00212 /*
00213  * Write a blob to the file stream with reserved space
00214  */
00215 void FileOutput::WriteBlob(std::ofstream &outstr, const void* value, int32_t data_size, int32_t reserved_size)
00216 {
00217         FileOutput::WriteInt32(outstr, reserved_size);
00218         //write the new value
00219         outstr.write((const char*)value, data_size);
00220         //fill in the reserved space
00221         for(int i=0;i<reserved_size-data_size;i++)
00222         {
00223                 outstr.put('\0');
00224         }
00225 }
